api.name: ObPaginatorService
api.usage: The easiest way is to import ObPaginatorModule.ObPaginatorModule also imports MatPaginatorModule. But if direct implementation is needed you could provide providers: [ObPaginatorService, {provide: MatPaginatorIntl, useClass: ObPaginatorService}] into your module. It's a child class and extends from MatPaginatorIntl.

methods.name: getRangeLabel
methods.text: Creates the label for the range of items within the current page and the length of the whole list.

variables.name: changes
variables.text: Stream to emit from when labels are changed. Use this to notify components when the labels have changed after initialization.

variables.name: itemsPerPageLabel
variables.text: A label for the page size selector. It is related to the i18n.pagination.items-per-page translation key.

variables.name: nextPageLabel
variables.text: A label for the button that increments the current page. It is related to the i18n.pagination.next-page translation key.

variables.name: previousPageLabel
variables.text: A label for the button that decrements the current page. It is related to the i18n.pagination.previous-page translation key.

variables.name: firstPageLabel
variables.text: A label for the button that moves to the first page. It is related to the i18n.pagination.first-page translation key.

variables.name: lastPageLabel
variables.text: A label for the range of items within the current page and the length of the whole list. It is related to the i18n.pagination.last-page translation key.

api.name: ObPaginatorDirective
api.usage: It should be used when a mat-paginator containing a mat-select is present. This will ensure that the mat-select within the mat-paginator has the correct oblique styling.
